TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AuthenticationServiceManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 配置身份验证服务的自定义实现的位置。

span.span: Configures the location of a custom implementation of the authentication service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类对应于属性或控件。The class corresponds to the property of the or control. 启用 AJAX 的应用程序使用身份验证 Web 服务以登录和注销从客户端脚本。The authentication Web service is used by AJAX-enabled applications to log on and log off from client script. 你可以使用提供身份验证而不是使用内置由 ASP.NET AJAX 功能提供的 Web 服务的 Web 服务的其他实现的路径。You can use to provide the path of an alternative implementation of the authentication Web service instead of using the built-in Web service that is provided by the AJAX features of ASP.NET. 若要在你的应用程序中使用的身份验证服务，必须在配置文件中启用它。To use the authentication service in your application, you must enable it in the configuration file. 如果你使用内置身份验证 Web 服务，你无需在页面上显式声明的身份验证服务管理器。If you use the built-in authentication Web service, you do not have to explicitly declare the authentication service manager on the page. 若要创建自己的身份验证服务，则必须实现 Web 服务具有两种方法：`Login`和`Logout`。To create your own authentication service, you must implement a Web service that has two methods: `Login` and `Logout`. 此外，这些方法需要内置身份验证 Web 服务的相同的签名。In addition, these methods require the same signature of the built-in authentication Web service. 下面的示例演示必须在自定义身份验证 Web 服务类中实现的基本类结构。The following example shows the basic class structure that must be implemented in a custom authentication Web service class. 若要使用自定义身份验证 Web 服务，你可以添加服务以声明方式在标记中包括``内的元素``元素在页面上，如下面的示例中所示。To use a custom authentication Web service, you can add the service declaratively in markup by including an `` element inside the `` element on the page, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 你可以以编程方式配置为使用自定义身份验证 Web 服务。You can also programmatically configure to use a custom authentication Web service. 无论采用何种身份验证服务的声明性节在页上，如果身份验证服务启用了在配置文件中，则启用 AJAX 的应用程序会在呈现的页面中包含的 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 变量.Regardless of whether the declarative section for the authentication service is on the page, if the authentication service is enabled in the configuration file, then AJAX-enabled applications will include an ECMAScript (JavaScript) variable in the rendered page. 这允许客户端脚本，以确定当前用户进行身份验证。This allows client script to determine whether the current user is authenticated.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置身份验证服务的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the authentication service.

value.span: 自定义身份验证 Web 服务的路径。

span.span: The path of the custom authentication Web service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未设置属性，则返回值是。If the property is not set, then the return value is . 在这种情况下，ASP.NET 中的 AJAX 功能然后将使用内置身份验证的以下内部默认路径相对应的 Web 服务: ~ / ScriptServices_AuthenticationService.asmx。In this case, the AJAX functionality in ASP.NET will then use the built-in authentication Web service that corresponds to the following internal default path: ~/ScriptServices_AuthenticationService.asmx. 如果你设置，则会发生相同的行为为空值或`null`。The same behavior occurs if you set to an empty value or `null`. 可以指定在控件或关联控件。 can be specified in the control or in an associated control. 当设置为级别，请注意以下事项：When is set at the level, the following caveats apply: - 如果控件层次结构中有多个代理不必在每个代理实例上设置。If there are multiple proxies in the control hierarchy, does not have to be set on each proxy instance. - 如果显式设置代理实例上，值必须显式设置此属性的所有其他代理的相同。If is explicitly set on a proxy instance, the value must be the same for all other proxies on which this property is explicitly set.

exception.span: 在控件层次结构中设置了多个唯一路径。

span.span: More than one unique path was set in the control hierarchy.
